lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve kept interest rates unchanged while noting that “near-term risks” to the economy had “diminished.”

headline.print_headline: Indexes Close Mixed as Fed Stands Pat
headline.main: Wall Street Closes Mixed After Fed Stands Pat

snippet: The Federal Reserve kept interest rates unchanged while noting that “near-term risks” to the economy had “diminished.”...
abstract: Stocks fall slightly as oil prices drop and Federal Reserve leaves interest rates unchanged.
